title: Season 6 Provisionals
body:
As the new season approaches, i was wondering if when it started, we have to go into some sort of provisionals for a new placement. When i first started ranked i was really terrible and ended in Bronze II. I really hope i can restart this season and make it to Gold. Any answer would be very much appreciated.
Thank You.

replies.body:
To all asking about why they got placed lower than what they were ranked last season, here is the official release:

> As usual, you'll have ten placement games to fight through before settling in to your tier and division, ready for the climb. Your placement is still heavily influenced by where you ended up last season and what you accomplished during preseason. If you’ve never played ranked, then your placements will be all that matters!
> Preseason brought some substantial changes to the game (learn more about preseason here, so we’re again running a soft reset before placements kick off. As with previous years because of the soft reset, you’ll likely place lower than where you ended last year.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-ranked-season-kicks-soon
I just won 8 out of my 10 promos, and i was b4 ending last season, and i get placed in b5. how does this work :/ {{item:3070}} {{champion:77}} {{item:3070}}

Hey man,

When the new season starts they do a reset yo your mmr. Something along the lines of (current mmr + some number) / 2 i think. Someone willing to look it up will tell you something more accurate. 

Basically if you do average in your provisional's you end up where you ended up last season.
I was silver1, didnt play any ranked during preseason and then won 7/10 of my provisionals. I got placed in s5. How does this work? :/

it would probably help if you played more games to adapt to the preseason patch.
 if you play enough and are sure you are skilled enough for gold then with  the help of **promo helper** you should reach gold eventually with effort during the new season.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/ranked-improvements.html

when s6 provisionals happen you are probably gonna be placed in bronze again (your mmr doesnt reset completely, it actually drops a lil). What you can do to help your chances of getting placed higher is to play ranked during the preseason. You can't change your rewards but your rank and mmr will still change, so when the big reset happens it can totally change the outcome.

In my exp i went from g4 season 4 to s4 season 5, yet i only lost 1 of my provisional's. i did put it down to a large losing streak during preseason that must have destroyed my mmr, based on that i came to the conclusion the provisional's mean very little, its actually your hidden mmr that determines your placement. my advice, do well in the preseason rack up some wins, go in and win over half your provisional's. should give you a good placement.
